H0.text: Who won best British group and best British album at the 2000 Brit Awards. Oasis

H1.text: Who won best British group and best British album at the 2000 Brit Awards. Coldplay

H2.text: Who won best British group and best British album at the 2000 Brit Awards. Blur

H3.text: Who won best British group and best British album at the 2000 Brit Awards. Travis

A4.text: Coldplay earned awards for Best British Group and Best British Album at the 2001 Brit Awards.

A5.text: the band again taking Best British Band at the annual Brit Awards.
